full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Interim Sand Filter System Reinstatement
#### Tender Information
 * **Solicitation Number** : WS4186786582
 * **Amendment Number** : 2 (published on January 26, 2024)
 * **Publication Date** : January 3, 2024
 * **Tender Closing Date** : February 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
 * **Amendment Date** : January 26, 2024

#### Contract Details
 * **Contracting Entity** : Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
 * **End User Entities** : Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
  
#### Solicitation Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC) to select a qualified contractor for the repair and rehabilitation works of the sewage treatment system at La Macaza Institution located in La Macaza, Quebec, Canada.

#### Notice Information
* **Notice URL** : https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18386734?extsite=MTgzODY3MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Contact Information** : Pierre-Luc Dube (SPAC/PSPC), pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Evaluation Criteria and Selection Method
The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price criterion. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. The bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EST on February 1, 2024. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. 

#### Trade Agreements and Regions
* **Trade Agreements** : Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions** : Work is to be completed in Mont-Tremblant region. 

### Requirements for Response
The bid should be submitted online at the specified URL above. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request. All supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00
